thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 6 de 669
thread.title: Sarah Wood

author: Sarah Wood
title: Sarah Wood
text: Once you've read the small print as it keeps changing its good. The deposit is a bit more expensive than other companies , but I have never had a problem with them refunding my money. The booking is easy , just ensure that the card you book with you take with you. And that the card holder is the main driver. The only disadvantage is that they won't hire for any longer than 28 days so when I go for longer I have to use another company which is a shame as I am a gold car member and always use them. Car hire companies have a pretty bad name in Spain , but I have always found gold car to be very good.
